snippet: Contract talks have started between Giancarlo Stanton and the Miami Marlins, who are prepared to offer a multiyear deal that would be a big departure for the historically thrifty franchise.
abstract: Contract talks have started between slugger Giancarlo Stanton and Miami Marlins, who are prepared to offer a multiyear deal that would be a big departure for the historically thrifty franchise; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: Contract talks have started between Giancarlo Stanton and the Miami Marlins, who are prepared to offer a multiyear deal that would be a big departure for the historically thrifty franchise.

headline.main: Miami Marlins and Giancarlo Stanton in Talks
